start: ^A helicopter is idling on the landing pad. It has an umbrella-like logo on its side. A man is loading boxes with a biological hazard symbol onto the helicopter.
wave: ^You wave at the pilot. He gives you an odd look.
run: ^You run up to the helicopter, just before you reach it a man steps out with a gun.
run_away: ^You run away. Maybe try again later?
karate_chop: ^You karate chop the pilot. He is stunned.
rush_pilot: ^You rush the pilot. However, the man with the gun gets up and clubs you upside the head. You stagger back away from the helicopter.
take_gun: ^You take the gun and club the man with it over the forehead. The pilot begs for mercy as you take in the scene.
^You pull out your phone and call the emergency line. An officer arrives in a few minutes, and thanks you for your service.
